responses: Hi there, how can I help?
See you later, thanks for visiting

Indigm is a global business and technology consulting firm. We partner with our clients to work on the most challenging issues that business face today. Our teams fully participate with our clients to understand the real business issues and provide practical, realistic and implementable recommendations that are backed by research based analytical data.
Indigm provides expertise in Technology, Business, process consulting

patterns: tell me about your technology expertise?
responses: Our technology team comprises of Data Scientists who slice and dice data for business intelligence and predictive and text analytics.

patterns: who is the ceo of indigm?
responses: abhishek sharma is the CEO and president of Indigm
